attributes.action: let cigarettes be displayed in shops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they are trying to stop displaying cigs in shops smokers are banned from smoking in pubs now we wont be able to go in shops and buy them wheres the smokers rights non smokers got their way for smoke free pubs but this is going to far now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
